title: Wedding Impossible - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Adapted to Manhwa   Female Protagonist   Marriage of Convenience   Modern Day   Younger Love Interests
author: Song Jeongwon   송정원
description:
Ahjung is preparing to fake a marriage with her gay childhood friend Jigyung in order to earn 500,000 dollars. She was an unknown actress at the age of 33 and was expecting her parents to strongly disagree but wait. Why is no one stopping us? Why is this so easy?

And as the marriage was about to succeed.

“Brother, are you crazy?”

A man crashed in and shouted.

“I AM AGAINST THIS MARRIAGE!”>
